website_summaries.verdict: This is a decent standing mat, but there are better options that we would recommend ahead of it.
pros: Available in several sizes and colors
Relieves fatigue in the back and lower body
Edges lay flat and are not a trip hazard
cons: Not good for long periods of standing
Tough to keep clean and shows dirt

customer_reviews.title: 3'x5' not as described
customer_reviews.text: The mat delivered was not as pictured. We ordered the 3'x5' mat, but it came with rounded lumps, not vertical lines. The picture attached is the one that came. The lumps are thicker than the listed thickness, not sure on the rest of it. More of a garage mat. Had to return the item, which was simple.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Really nice mat, feel and shape.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, but a little expensive $33 for 3x5. Left my heel foot impression on the mat, but eventually went away. Feels so good to your feet and its warm, but its more foam like. Looks nice, has a little weight to it and i like how the edges curve downwards. I like the style and its thick. Very easy to sweep.
customer_reviews.author: PRINCESS

customer_reviews.title: Oh my aching feet!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have bought for my kitchen. I absolutely love it! I spend a lot of time cooking and found myself migrating to the area where I had my first mat. I finally broke down and bought a bigger one so I could use the rest of my kitchen...ha ha ha. This makes such a difference on the fatigue I feel in my back and feet. I recommend it to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Kate

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had bought it sooner
customer_reviews.text: I got this to go in front of my washer and dryer. The concrete floor is hard and soooooo cold this time of year, and this makes all the difference in the world to me. Admittedly, it's not the most attractive thing in the world, but for the laundry room? Who cares? I like that the edges are beveled to reduce the risk of tripping - especially because my cats are usually in there with me, so the tripping possibilities are very real. :)
customer_reviews.author: Crow Meris

customer_reviews.title: Just Right for My Knee
customer_reviews.text: Getting a little (lot) older and my joints won't take what they used to. The tile in my bathroom is raised above the grout joints and gives me shin splints. This mat is the perfect softness for me, and fits under the doors. Minus one star because it is a bit too not slip (sticky) for me, but I sprinkled a little corn starch powder on it and solved the problem. I love it, my problem is solved.
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Good for under baby gym
customer_reviews.text: I got this to go under my infant gym. It’s just under 3’x3’. We have wooden floors and I didn’t want my baby hitting her head on the hard floor and my bottom was tired of sitting on the hard floor with her so I got this and it works great! It’s thick and cushiony. If she flops her head it doesn’t hurt and my sit bones aren’t sore after 30 minutes of playing. Win win. It was hard to find something large enough to go under the gym but this was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C.

customer_reviews.title: Floor Protection
customer_reviews.text: So normally I don't get bothered by fatigue when I'm focused on something in the workshop craft/hobby room but since that it technically a former extra bedroom the paint pouring, razor blades dropping, glue dripping, and sanding over our hardwood floor does seem to bother the wife so I grabbed this to protect the floor. It does a great job protecting the floor and is easy to cleanup so being less drained after tinkering in there all night is a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: HiGravity

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for me!
customer_reviews.text: Great mat! I’m using it for jump rope so my ropes won’t fray so quickly. I’ve already testing it out and I’m very impressed. It has enough cushion too to serve as shock absorbers so the concrete won’t be too hard on my knees either. When I’m done, it’s easy to roll up and put away. I’m very pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: allnatural

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for support under foot
customer_reviews.text: I started doing woodworking in my garage and began to notice backaches after standing for long periods on the concrete floor. This mat is excellent! I got the 3ft x 5ft size and placed it in front of my work bench and boy did it do the trick. The ridges in the mat make it easy to clean and it does not show stains. This was the best money I ever spent and my back loves me for it.
customer_reviews.author: Aussiebat

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable memory foam style mat. Works great in front of my toolbox. It's kept up with the heavy-duty lifestyle pretty good so far no tears or rips yet.
customer_reviews.author: Apocalyptic Fab

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised. It’s foam not hard vinyl.
customer_reviews.text: Product advertised as vinyl. I’m purchasing in hopes of using it for flooring for a rabbit enclosure. Nope. It’s foam. Took one evening to waste 35 bucks. Not sure what I’ll end up actually using it for now that it’s shredded. So because of this, I rated it low. If you’re looking for a foam mat to stand on to help foot and back pain, it would work great for that. It is very pourus so will retain moisture quite easily. It’s is sensitive enough that an accidental knock with a long fingernail it took a small piece out.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Spurling

customer_reviews.title: My Feet thank me daily :D
customer_reviews.text: I bought this due to my feet would throb after cooking 3 meals, washing, cleaning, and then cooking again. One of the many @home responsibilities of a parent of 3; 4 if you include the husband. Anywho.... love the thickness, not too bulky. Sleek design, NON SLIP (wooty-woot). Stupid easy to clean. Honestly, totally worth it if you are on hard surfaces majority of the day. Trust me, your feet will thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny.D

customer_reviews.title: Super squishy like memory foam
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow! This mat is so squishy and amazing on the feet! And such a good price for 5' by 3'. This was a very good purchase! I bought this to make the floor of a catio enclosure nicer for my cats, and they love sleeping on this. It looked in the pictures like it would feel like rubber but it feels like memory foam and leaves foot impressions for a while after you lift your foot.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: NICER THAN YOU THINK!
customer_reviews.text: We use this under our wine chiller. The beauty of it is that we were able to cut it to shape and no one was the wiser! The dark color hides wine stains and keeps them off of our flooring. The cushioning keeps the chillers' feed from making dents in the floor as well. It's thicker than you'd think, but perfect for it's intended use. Very cheap insurance against wine related damages!
customer_reviews.author: Norma J. O'Quinn

customer_reviews.title: It's really a great deal when you break it down to cost per ...
customer_reviews.text: I own a 6000 sf commercial woodshop and so I bought the 60 foot roll. It's really a great deal when you break it down to cost per foot compared to the short ones. When we cut it, the ends stay flat on the floor- one thing i worried about before I bought it. It's very comfy to stand on and seems durable. We surrounded all of the workbenches and the guys are super happy. It shipped very fast too. Nice job Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: D. Zander

customer_reviews.title: A quality mat.
customer_reviews.text: I like the nonslip ability and the padding it offers, I use it in the back of my SUV to protect the merchandise I carry.
customer_reviews.author: Francis M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Believe it or not, this Guardian Air Step Anti-Fatigue Floor Runner is in my kitchen. it is 3' x 12' and works beautifully between my kitchen island and oven/counter area. Quality vinyl! It does not leave indentations embedded in the mat. Holds it shape and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B.

customer_reviews.title: not too thick, and helps
customer_reviews.text: I know some mats may be more cushy, but this one is thin enough that people don't trip over it. Over the years it has started to leave little bits of foam rubber on the floor though, I suppose it depends on your footwear in the kitchen - my house shoes have kind of an aggressive sole... decide for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Thorsrud

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't do anything. I've been using this for 2.5 weeks and my feet are always killing me. I decided to purchase a better and thicker mat to see if it's better. This mat is VERY thin so if it's just a few minutes or an hour at a time, you might be fine. If you need this to stand all day, buy a mat that is thicker!
customer_reviews.author: Mandie

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy unless you are sure!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and it is not quite right for what I wanted and had found a mat for $9.99 at Costco that actually worked better. When I went to return this, they charged $11 to return...nearly half the cost. Very unhappy and will keep reluctantly.
customer_reviews.author: Jillybean

customer_reviews.title: Was NOT allowed to return it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this mat to put under my washer and dryer on my new hardwood floors. It was too big and would not work properly. I tried to return it and was told I was not allowed to. DON"T WORK WITH THIS SELLER
customer_reviews.author: Patty Jenco

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It is barely 1/2" thick (if I'm being generous) but the foam is comfortable. Doesn't feel like it would hold up to heavy use but we'll see. You can definitely tell the difference between standing on the mat and standing on the hard floor. For the price it seems good, but with use I can foresee this thing flattening. Standing on it for just a couple of minutes leaves an imprint (which goes away pretty quick, but the mat is still new. Wouldn't recommend this product if you have actual back or knee problems but for someone just hoping to prevent them I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: ngbooks

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! NOT WHAT IS PICTURED!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the 6 ft by 60 ft gray rubber mat and got 2 CAR MATS. Completely ridiculous. And it took 2 extra days to get to us. Do not buy! Not even close to what is pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Myers

customer_reviews.title: As pictured
customer_reviews.text: Its as puctured. Its softer and more foam-like than I hoped. I'm wondering if it will hold up against wear and tear from animals. It had a strong rubber smell when I opened the box so its been airing out. It looks like it will be easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: did not work
customer_reviews.text: i stand for long hours at my job. This did not mitigate pain in my heels. The mat is so thin that it does absolutely nothing for me. Now I gotta DIY this by cutting and doubling up on the mats to see if it makes a difference. you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much useless...
customer_reviews.text: It was much too thin, and ineffective. I have one from Costco, cheaper, thicker, and offers much more support and comfort. I sent this back, very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J. Charles

customer_reviews.title: Good, durable and worth while
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for plank exercises and it only fits one person on the mat. It is a little rough for the arms but its durable with an easy to clean material. It does the job. I wish I bought the next one that is longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Teal

customer_reviews.title: Excellant matt
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 large dogs and I used it for their feeding matt. Works great and cleans easy. Very durrable with reguards to dog paws. You can't buy this size of a dog matt for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids playroom
customer_reviews.text: I searched everywhere for a easy clean cushion mat for my kids playroom. This is so perfect! And very inexpensive compared to other things I was looking at. Easy to clean up snack spills, play-doh and paint. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: marri

customer_reviews.title: Good look and feel, but not the most durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a comfort floor in my Jeep for the dog, and it's starting to tear after a few uses. Not saying this should be as sturdy as am industrial mat but was hoping for a little more strength
customer_reviews.author: JKelley

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and thick
customer_reviews.text: We placed this in front of the refrigerator to deter dogs. It is easy to clean although it collects dust and debris from those walking by but it does trap it from the rest of the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great for offices
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and extremely comfy. Avoid placing very heavy objects or sharp corners on it because that can puncture / damage the urethane foam. Great for any office.
customer_reviews.author: barry

customer_reviews.title: Deal
customer_reviews.text: Bought to be a carpet cover. The shape was odd but does the job. It absorbs pressure well. Indentions don't totally come out from a stool. This is my busy corner.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Only used this mat for about 3 weeks now, maybe less, and the material is starting to breakdown and show severe wear. Not expecting this mat to hold up well for much longer. Disappointed with such bad quality when initially it seemed nice.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Better than the smaller individual mats that tend to slide around
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! We put it in our kitchen so it runs the entire length of cabinets where sink and stove sits. Makes for a more pleasant kitchen experience. Easier on the feet and back!
customer_reviews.author: Jelynn S

customer_reviews.title: Relieved leg pains.
customer_reviews.text: We are slowly putting these in all the bathrooms as out-of-shower mat, in front of stove, sink, and a larger one for counter area. The relief is HUGE! With one person with sever leg disability and another with rheumatoid arthritis...these things are great!
customer_reviews.author: Spady

customer_reviews.title: Great multipurpose floor mat.
customer_reviews.text: It works very well for the purpose I needed it. I also use it around my garage when I need to crawl around on the floor for a project. Lightweight and easy on the knees!
customer_reviews.author: Russell W.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed This mat is thinner than the one in ad replacing after two years Basically super thin rubber mat I don’t even think worth $30 I paid Not a great mat
customer_reviews.author: Johninct

customer_reviews.title: Padded floor mat
customer_reviews.text: We’re using it in our kitchen and it’s nicely padded and reduces fatigue when my wife and I are standing and preparing meals. We’ll put cloth floor mats over this mat to hide the “industrial” look but it works very well in reducing fatigue.
customer_reviews.author: D. Nakao

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for my kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: I have a long corridor shaped kitchen and instead of buying two of those expensive mats, I just bought this one long strip and its wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: James G. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! This mat had helped greatly in my workspace. Not only does it help with my back, it just allows me to keep my grip and keep my feet warm on the cement surface of my shop. I'd recommend this to every shop owner. I'm sure I could find dozens of uses for this. From giving me something to lay on while changing the oil on my car, to entrances over ice. It really is that great!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Nice, soft pad to stand on
customer_reviews.text: I put this in front of my workbench. Feels real good to stand on. Also helps me find screws and stuff when I drop them on the floor :)
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: More like memory foam
customer_reviews.text: Bought for use on concrete. Too soft. More like memory foam . Description said 1/2 inch thick which gave me impression of a more dense foam. Won't buy again
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mat! Large, durable & NO ODORS!
customer_reviews.text: Great mat at a great price point! The mat is comfortable, durable, cleans easily, and doesn't have a string rubber odor.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Well made, wish I bought something thicker.
customer_reviews.text: Would have liked a little bit more cushion, will remember with the next purchase. Great for light duty work bench, not practical for long periods of standing. I recommend finding something just a little bit thicker. This mat itself is very well made, and provides an appropriate amount of cushion. Great for the garage mechanic or hobby workstation. Plenty of grip so that you dont slip.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Berger

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: It looks good and feels great. More cushion that I expected. I may order a larger one to cover more area. It's a bit pricey and it remains to be seen how it holds up over time, but I'm completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY ON THIS FATIGUE MAT
customer_reviews.text: I cook alot and my legs and feet really hurt when I stand long periods of time. So I looked for a good mat and found this one. The size works well between my stove and island. . The light gray color goes well with my stainless appliances . Even the ridges that make up the mat, are easy to sweep and clean. Food seems to clean up well. I'm ordering another one to go alongside. Great buy...
customer_reviews.author: Ms Em

customer_reviews.title: Hard. Doesn't work. Smells. Hard to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Hard. Not soft at all. Grooves make it hard to clean. Smells like factory chemicals. Stood on it while cooking dinner. It does not work at all. It hardness feels like the plastic storage bins.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Warmth?!? It's a mat for gosh sakes...
customer_reviews.text: Good size and cushion thickness, wear and tear/durability will take more time to determine...
customer_reviews.author: Wiseguy

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: Work in a very old garage that has seen some abuse. This mat is heaven. I cant believe it's only 30 bucks if I'm being honest. It's not necessarily the toughest one I've ever seen but idc. Snap on sells these for like 450 bucks, forget that crap. Get you one of these and you'll be glad ya did.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but not for a kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Used in the kitchen. Comfort was good, but it quickly developed cracks which were "impossible" to clean and keep clean. Had to discard in 7 months. I would not recommend it if you want to keep it clean.
customer_reviews.author: PWM

customer_reviews.title: Soft and well made
customer_reviews.text: The material is perfect for bathrooms. Soaks in the wetness and doesn't leave that damp feeling behind. very soft and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Beniquez

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Matt I used it to line the floor of my cargo van. Does a great job of insulating for sound also
customer_reviews.author: Leonard L.

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the shampoo help can stand on them all day so far they love them
customer_reviews.author: ernest bickley

customer_reviews.title: Cushioned mat. Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Good use for my back when standing all day. Feel much better!
customer_reviews.author: ElChappo

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: It’s more lightweight then I had hoped for. More foam- like than rubber. Overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: ALIJANE

customer_reviews.title: VIKTORIA
customer_reviews.text: VERY NICE - SOFT - GOOD FOR HOME - PEOPLE AND PETS - ORDER 6 P-- GOOD GUILITY
customer_reviews.author: James T. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: helps Reduce Leg Fatigue
customer_reviews.text: I run a small business from home that requires a lot of standing while I make the product. I was having issues with my legs getting tired standing on my basement floor (which is concrete underneath). This has fixed the problem and I no longer get tired standing for an hour straight.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Guptill

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was worried it might be too thinning provide adequate cushion, but that was not the case is has very effect of lessening foot strain on from standing on hard ceramic tiles. Wish they had a size in-between the 3x5 and 3x12, I got the 3x5 and couple more feet would span the length the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Treat your feet, protect your floor
customer_reviews.text: So pleased. Feels very nice on my tired back and cleanup is simple.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Weisz

customer_reviews.title: Don't throw your money away!
customer_reviews.text: A quick review when I purchased it I thought this is going to be good but after a month it felt just like i was standing on the cement floor! What a waist! Now I'm looking for something else! Think really hard before you purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice anti-fatigue mat
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product and has definitely helped ease the strain on my feet and back while at the sink and counter in the kitchen. Caveat: It does get a bit slick when wet though so I wouldn't recommend this particular pattern if you have kids running around.
customer_reviews.author: S. Steinbeck

customer_reviews.title: Quality and problem resolution
customer_reviews.text: Yes, 5 stars. It was as described. Not as soft as the gel mats, but also not nearly as expensive. However, the problem resolving was fast and effective. My order was shipped to the wrong address in the wrong state. In response to my email, a second was immediately dispatched. I greatly value organizations which quickly and favorably resolve problems. Thus, in sum, 5.
customer_reviews.author: CHPS

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Not durable as it should be. We’ve already got a tear on it the first day while trying to move our elliptical around. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Anh

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome floor mat! Great cushion, covers a large space in my kitchen. My vacuum rolls over it easily. It grips the floor and doesn't slide.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this mat under my disabled husband’s lift chair. It is easy to clean and protects the floor from things he drops. I have tried other types of mat but they did not prove to be as durable.
customer_reviews.author: Mamma

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect product description
customer_reviews.text: Still really upset. The product I received was nothing like the product description or photos. It was not eligible for return. Tried to call Amazon with no success. Looks like I am not the only person with this issue. I am going to go to Home Depot. Gave the mat to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: William P.

customer_reviews.title: Product Sheds
customer_reviews.text: Steady traffic causes product to 'shed' little black beads and they get everywhere. Would be a better value otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: R Self

customer_reviews.title: A good rope jumping mat
customer_reviews.text: I use it for rope jumping. The size is perfect. It helps buffer the force on my knees and prolong the life span of the rope.
customer_reviews.author: Customer NY

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the laundry room. Perfect fit, great quality and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Melody

customer_reviews.title: These are nice matts but not quite as thick as I was ...
customer_reviews.text: These are nice matts but not quite as thick as I was expecting. They are pretty dense material and heavy but work great for an auto garage. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Zan M.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great size! Easy to roll up and put away for when I’m not standing. Wish it was a little thicker, but it is much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: A. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for our kitchen. So easy to clean. Cut to fi very easily and feels comfortable on my tired feet.
customer_reviews.author: sangel0399

customer_reviews.title: fragile and slippery
customer_reviews.text: tears easy. slippery on the bottom. be aware it moves when you step on it.
customer_reviews.author: bml

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: top quality product that prolongs your time in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: thom805

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: perfect for work. on our feet all the time and these are perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mat
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. Just one tiny problem, it moves a little. It's on carpet in the kitchen and it moves ever so slightly, but it is what I needed by the sink and stove.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Groflo

customer_reviews.title: Not for Industrial
customer_reviews.text: While this is quite comfortable to stand on, it stood up to less than 1 year at an auto parts counter, then began to disintegrate. Looking for a more durable solution.
customer_reviews.author: Nucky

customer_reviews.title: Commmmmfy! When You have to stand up all day ...
customer_reviews.text: Commmmmfy! When You have to stand up all day these things are a lifesaver. I can work almost twice as long when I use these. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: R. D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: appear to be very good quality and they're extremely comfortable to work on
customer_reviews.text: appear to be very good quality and they're extremely comfortable to work on.... but as is the case with these types of floor mats, only time will tell what they're actually all about, whether or not they're built to last....
customer_reviews.author: roberto

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase as good as the first!
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was made because my staff loved my previous purchase of Guardian so much! They are well made and hold up well to daily cleaning, plus the no slip surface and more than adequate cushion keep my staff energized throughout the day!
customer_reviews.author: Snap

customer_reviews.title: Really is Anti Fatigue! Delighted with it.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I could not be happier. Trimmed it to fit in my apartment under the rice paper thin Oriental rug that is under the bed in my furnished rent s room. Trimming was easy with good pair of sewing shears. This guardian air step is fabulous! Going to purchase one more and then I will be all set.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Damour

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move
customer_reviews.text: Using this over concrete floor. Legs are hurting less. Easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable for standing on long periods of time
customer_reviews.text: Not very comfortable for standing on long periods of time, also not oil resistant will leave stains. Overall we use 4 of them at work everyday and they have not ripped but they are not very comfortable after a few weeks. I would not recommend this product if you will be using everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Victor M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice mat, great value for a low cost mat
customer_reviews.text: Nice mat, I agree with the other positive reviews. Sturdy, comfortable, textured so you won't slip if you spill a little water on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Bernd Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Steppping Lightly
customer_reviews.text: like walking on air. Bought 12 ft long for my workshop. Durable, well made.
customer_reviews.author: garretdorsey

customer_reviews.title: Good for the back hard on the eyes.
customer_reviews.text: Although it works well, it is hard to keep clean looking. Stains just won't clean off.
customer_reviews.author: Aric

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, not as thick as I thought, but good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jose M Soria

customer_reviews.title: Great Antifatigue Mat...
customer_reviews.text: Great mat for by the kitchen sink! Stays clean, good support,
customer_reviews.author: G M T

customer_reviews.title: To hard, not soft
customer_reviews.text: ALOT THINNER THAN EXPECTED. I would send them back if i had time. they are hard and not comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Keifer

customer_reviews.title: Overall build quality appears to be good but does tend to move on carpet
customer_reviews.text: Overall build quality appears to be good but does tend to move on carpet. Also it would be better if it were thicker as it does not provide as much cushion as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Bax

customer_reviews.title: So far it seems to be working fine to cushion the floor
customer_reviews.text: I have a standup desk arrangement and this mat is the right size. So far it seems to be working fine to cushion the floor. I still need a step stool to relieve the pressure on the back (highly recommended).
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was the best purchase ever. This is underneath my pet's food bowls and makes clean up easy.
customer_reviews.author: CuteBaldChick

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Used at the entrance to my above ground pool !! Great mat very strong, thick and durable

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! Not sure what else to say about it. This is incredibly helpful at my standing desk to help me stay comfortable.

customer_reviews.text: I cook alot and this feels good to my feet. I placed it directly in front of my stove.

customer_reviews.title: Very thin matt.
customer_reviews.text: Very thin matt and has grooves that are hard to clean down inside them.

customer_reviews.title: Makes our feet smile
customer_reviews.text: My second purchase of this product. The first one is being used in my husband's man cave and the new one will go to our son for his work bench area. Happy feet!
customer_reviews.author: Campin' Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to cover my kitchen floor (by the sink), so perfect easy to clean and I got the right size .
customer_reviews.author: Ana Reyes Vega

product_meta.title: Guardian Air Step Anti-Fatigue Floor Mat, Vinyl, 27"x32", Black, Reduces fatigue and discomfort, Can be easily cut to fit any space
product_meta.description:
Size:27"x32"| Color:Black

Be proactive in developing a safe, healthy and productive environment for everyone in your family or facility!

Anti-Fatigue mats are wonderful additions to areas where prolonged standing or kneeling causes fatigue.

Guardian Air Step mats are the perfect solution for home and commercial use. 

 In your home they provide relief anywhere where you are standing or kneeling for a prolonged period of time. Areas such as the kitchen, in front of the sink, the bathroom, laundry room, even the garage or exercise room. 

In the workplace increase worker productivity and decrease injury with these mats in personal workstations. Placements include customer service counters, hotel registration desks, retail store check-out stands, building reception areas, work stations, restaurant hostess stations, industrial areas, and assembly lines. 

Guardian Soft Step mats are commercial grade with a 3/8"vinyl foam construction to ensure higher durability and better resilience then ordinary vinyl sponge mats. The surface features a raised design and can be easily cut to any size using just a pair or scissors

Guardian Air Step Anti Fatigue Mats have a one-year warranty for material and workmanship, with proper use and maintenance. 

Warranty 

Guardian Air Step Anti Fatigue Mats have a one-year warranty for material and workmanship, with proper use and maintenance. Guardian Floor Protection warrants new products against defects in material and workmanship when used and maintained as instructed. See our website for full details.

All trade sizes indicated are approximate sizes, mat sizes are not always an exact measurement. Due to the manufacturing process some shrinkage may occur.
feature_bullets: 3/8" vinyl construction ensures higher durability and better resilience than ordinary vinyl sponge mats
Can easily be cut to any custom size with just a pair of scissors
Support provided by vinyl foam structure
